General.Name: Ivanhoe Electric Inc.
General.Description: Ivanhoe Electric Inc. explores and develops metals and mineral. It provides Typhoon data acquisition system, a geophysical system that offers primary signal. It also explores copper and gold. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.Ivanhoe Electric Inc. operates as a subsidiary of I-Pulse Inc.
General.Address: 606'?'999 Canada Place, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E1
